name: persian-datepicker-element
description: A modern Jalali (Shamsi) Date Picker web component with shadcn-like styling

scripts.build: pnpm run build:clean && pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run build:dev && pnpm run build:esm && pnpm run minify && pnpm run cleanup
scripts.build:clean: set CLEAN_DIST=true && set NODE_ENV=development && set OUTPUT_FILE=placeholder.js && rspack
scripts.build:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && set OUTPUT_FILE=jalali-date-picker.min.js && set MINIFY=true && rspack
scripts.build:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set OUTPUT_FILE=jalali-date-picker.js && set MINIFY=false && rspack
scripts.build:esm: set NODE_ENV=production && set OUTPUT_FILE=jalali-date-picker.esm.js && set MODULE_TYPE=module && set MINIFY=true && rspack
scripts.minify: node minify.js jalali-date-picker.min.js && node minify.js jalali-date-picker.esm.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run test && pnpm run build

author: Ahmad Mehrabi
